name: Hulvire Aktuality
author: Fajnor

sections.description:
Plugin for displaying messages or news with simple picture gallery on wordpress sites.
Simple text entry and thumbnail pictures, option to add multiple images.
sections.installation:
1. Upload hulvire-aktuality folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place in your pages [huu_aktuality]
  4. in themes
    huu_get_aktuality();

This plugin needs for proper function Meta Box plugin installed. Optional is WP Lightbox 2 or any.
